org.apache.giraph.partition

类 PartitionExchange

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.partition.PartitionExchange

  • public class PartitionExchange
extends Object
    Describes what is required to send and wait for in a potential partition exchange between workers.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      PartitionExchange(Set<WorkerInfo> myDependencyWorkerSet, Map<WorkerInfo,List<Integer>> sendWorkerPartitionMap)
      Only constructor.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean doExchange()
      Is this worker involved in a partition exchange?
      Set<WorkerInfo> getMyDependencyWorkerSet()
      Get the workers that I must wait for
      Map<WorkerInfo,List<Integer>> getSendWorkerPartitionMap()
      Get a mapping of worker to list of partition ids I need to send to.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • PartitionExchange

        public PartitionExchange(Set<WorkerInfo> myDependencyWorkerSet,
                 Map<WorkerInfo,List<Integer>> sendWorkerPartitionMap)
        Only constructor.
        参数:
        myDependencyWorkerSet - All the workers I must wait for
        sendWorkerPartitionMap - Partitions I need to send to other workers

    • 方法详细资料

      • getMyDependencyWorkerSet

        public Set<WorkerInfo> getMyDependencyWorkerSet()
        Get the workers that I must wait for
        返回:
        Set of workers I must wait for

      • getSendWorkerPartitionMap

        public Map<WorkerInfo,List<Integer>> getSendWorkerPartitionMap()
        Get a mapping of worker to list of partition ids I need to send to.
        返回:
        Mapping of worker to partition id list I will send to.

      • doExchange

        public boolean doExchange()
        Is this worker involved in a partition exchange? Receiving or sending?
        返回:
        True if needs to be involved in the exchange, false otherwise.
